<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Convert a loop into a loop with bottom test. It may</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">/// perform loop latch simplication as well if the flag RotationOnly</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">/// is false. The flag Threshold represents the size threshold of the loop</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">/// header. If the loop header&#39;s size exceeds the threshold, the loop rotation</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">/// will give up. The flag IsUtilMode controls the heuristic used in the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="comment">/// LoopRotation. If it is true, the profitability heuristic will be ignored.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
